Detailed Description

This class is a chunk item that represents an exit portal.

If we are drawn, you can be sure that there has been some 'inside/outside' action going on.

Member Typedef Documentation

Constructor.

Member Function Documentation

void ChunkExitPortal::draw (  )  [virtual]

This method implements the ChunkItem draw interface.

It simply adds ourselves to the seenExitPortals list for later use by anybody (for example the rain uses it to draw rain from the inside.)

Reimplemented from ChunkItemBase.

bool ChunkExitPortal::load ( DataSectionPtr  pSection  ) 

This method loads a ChunkExitPortal from a data section.

However, this is not meant to happen, so instead we assert (as it would be a code error, for example WorldEditor saving out ChunkExitPortals to .chunk files by accident.)

There is no reason why ChunkExitPortals couldn't be, in future, saved to .chunk files for specific reasons - in that case, just remove the assert and implement the load functionality.

Parameters:
pSection DataSection containing information for us.
Returns:
always returns false.

This method returns the list of seen exit portals for the current frame.

Returns:
ChunkExitPortal::Vector& exit portals seen this frame.
